author: mrodozov
body:
this is listing the commits on the base branch (either master or main)
and when it tries to create new tag/release skips tag names which are tagging commits not from the base/default branch.
this is tested and its working, see 
https://github.com/npc-data/PhysicsTools-NanoAOD/tags
and 
https://github.com/npcbot/cmsdist/pulls
the tag https://github.com/npc-data/PhysicsTools-NanoAOD/releases/tag/V01-06-01 is tagging non base branch and it is skipped,
so the previous tag is taken 01-06-00 to create 01-07-00
For PRs against non base branches the job fails (to be dealt manually)
title: Use tag names on commits from base branch
